statements: UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = 100, restock_threshold = 20 WHERE product_name = 'Desk';
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock - 1 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE inventory SET current_stock = current_stock + 5, restock_threshold = 20 WHERE product_id = 105;
UPDATE InventoryItems SET quantity = 20 WHERE item_id = 1;
UPDATE RestockOrders SET quantity = 50, order_date = '2022-01-05' WHERE order_id = 3;
UPDATE InventoryItems SET item_name = 'New Laptop', quantity = 50 WHERE employee_id = 101;
UPDATE RestockOrders SET order_date = '2022-02-15', quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE order_id = 201;
UPDATE InventoryLocation SET location_name='Warehouse A', capacity=1000 WHERE location_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE suppliers SET phone_number = '+1-123-456-7890' WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Supplier';
UPDATE inventory_products SET current_quantity = current_quantity - 5, product_name = 'Updated Product 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE suppliers SET supplier_name = 'New Supplier Name', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE contact_person = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Product SET quantity = 50 WHERE product_id = 101;
UPDATE StockHistory SET restock_quantity = 25, restock_date = '2022-08-20' WHERE history_id = 201;
